abstract: NBA Roundup; Houston Rockets defeat Utah Jazz, 117-91, to win Southwest Division and No 2 seed in Western Conference; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Anthony Davis had 31 points and 13 rebounds, and the New Orleans Pelicans earned a playoff berth with a victory over the San Antonio Spurs.

headline.main: Pelicans Earn First Playoff Spot Since 2011; Bulls Edge Hawks to Lock Up East’s No. 3 Seed
headline.print_headline: Rockets Capture No. 2 Seed in the West

snippet: Anthony Davis had 31 points and 13 rebounds, and the New Orleans Pelicans earned a playoff berth with a victory over the San Antonio Spurs.
